comments: Pengalaman memginap yang memgesankan. Staff hotel sangat ramah, kamar bersih, kamar mandi bersih, tiap ba'da maghrib dikirimkan camilan. Saya pasti menginap di hotel ini lagi.
Semuanya baik.
Menyenangkan

Good view and near marlioboro,
Good facility with becak motor
Hotel melia yang semakin berseri setelah mengalami berbagai sentuhan penyegaran dan renovasi interior.
Lokasi strategis
I love the lobby and the brrakfast
The room and the property was really nice. Food was great and the pool was very child friendly, our kids loved it.

superb hotel... superb service... very big and comfy room... walking distance to Malioboro Shopping Street... superb breakfast buffet, wide variety and can request for packed breakfast box (3 choices= continental or indonesian or healthy) if you intend to visit sunrise activities in Yogyakarta (they can prepare as early as 3.30am!)... 10/10... will be back if visit Yogyakarta again... thank Melia!
Excellent breakfast, very friendly staff, great location

Very clean room and nice view of the garden. Excellent price! Staff is really friendly and helpful. The Patio restaurant food was great and reasonably priced. My only complaint is that I wish that they offered signature cocktails. Other than that, our experience here was wonderful and I would definitely recommend staying here!
Good hotel in central Yogyakarta
Great location. Lovely hotel all around very worthy hotel

Very good and relaxing time at the hotel. The staff was very helpful and competent.
Small hiccup, the shower door was not closing perfectly leading the water to leak out
So so

about Hotel
The GOOD:
   The room was clean and tidy.
   The service by all hotel staff was excellent.
The BAD:
   None
The MEDIOCRE:
  The shower in the shower room only gives water.
  (But I can take a warm shower near bathtub)

about ASTRINDO Travel services(in the hotel)
The GOOD:
   The service by front staff was excellent.
   During my tour,the driver was professional and he also entertained me all the way.
The BAD:
   I was charged a fare 150000 RUPIAH from hotel to Adisutjipto airport by the company's driver (diffrent driver from above).
   It was early morning (5:30 am),but to think about the distance (10km,30min) It's expensive.There must be his car Ferrari with Toyota emblem.
Hotel feels old, with some room furniture clearly old and tired.
Perfect hotel!! Clean, modern, few restaurants with good food , dinner for two $50 (without alcohol). Just try to stay there you will not regret!
Staffs are very friendly and helpful, smiling every time.

The room was big and clean with modern renovation, yhi wellness spa offer for fruity indulgence was very relaxing! Service was very good as well! However noted a cockroach running around, although staff was very prompt in removing the cockroach once notified
WIFI network was poor. No connection was given to WIFI on the second day.
Nice and relaxing place
Lovely hotel , great stay. All the hotel amenities were excellent- pool, food, room , staff, spa, decor.
Kamar yang baru direnovasi, staff yang ramah, breakfast kurang bervariasi
Everything about the hotel is great. Services, room conditions, food (both paid dinner and free breakfast) was alright. Location is so so, nothing much around. The famous Maliboro street is just meh.

Near from central
Average for breakfast
Already renovation
Very comfortable, stylish and friendly property.  Great pool & surrounding gardens
I love the place but the room are infected with ants.
Nice hotel  , good breakfast , overall very good . My suggestion for dustbins please change to te one opening by pressing by foot n not using how hands to open it .

Hotel clean and pleasant, food was just OK, but the staff could not have been any more helpful or friendly (really lovely).  Not a great deal to do in the area.  You really are staying in the area to see the temples, although also a good opportunity to have a massage in the spa at a reasonable cost.
Everything is perfect at this hotel. Great location next to a supermarket and the middle of town. The breakfast was excellent.
Hotel is amazing! City view of Mount Merapi. Hotel staffs are helpful. Must try the javanese massage.
Temple visits, city based

Good location if you are interested in shopping at Marliboro Road (just 5 mins. walk). Has a resort ambience. Rooms were large and pleasant (understand renovation done not too long ago.). Very friendly and service orientated staff. Breakfast was limited with very small international selection. Local selection was good especially must try the Jamu (delicious and refreshing).

Had cockroach in the room the first night. Again in the second day anotjer cockroach. Third day had lizard in the room. Eventually was moved to another room on the last day. Not much in way of appology otjer than we'll get the cleaner to look. Food was similar in price to Hong Kong for a steak and wine/beer was extortionate. Water in pool was dirty, so didnt bother to go in. Not what I was expecting from a 5 star hotel.
Great concept, and great staff to match made to feel very welcome. Centrally located to town centre
The hotel and room is Clean, with good service from the employees, and it is near Malioboro street (walkable distance).
Staff were great. The stores next door were very convenient.

Everything was goood and extremely well maintained. Sofa are cleaned by stuff Everyday. However I felt that my room was pretty dusty, especially the bed. The bed frames were dusty. We stay 8 days. It’s in a good location near almost everywhere. The pedicure and Medicare at the spa has to improve, I rather spend my bucks else there than to use their spa services.
Helpful staff, pleasant grounds with gardens, great location. We would have wished for a memory foam mattress for comfort but the standard ones were fine.
Nice hotel close to malioboro street
Very accommodating staff. Wonderful place. You can do everything in the convenience of the hotel. Food was wonderful.
Wonderful hotel that was situated close to Borobudur and Prambanan tourist spots. The staff were very accommodating. Overall we enjoyed our stay.

Surprisingly after 2 hours being in the room, cockroach came out from mini bar cabinet. Coffee stains all over the toilet door. All fashion classic look hotel. Manage to inform the housekeeping supervisor.

The reception was warm and welcoming. The staff were very helpful in attending to our requests. The room is very comfortable and the swimming pool is awesome! The area is within walking distance to shops and eating places.
Only complaint was the A/C in my room would only get down to about 23 despite being set to 18, informed staff but made no difference. Everything else about the hotel was great.

A friendly hotel with caring attentive staff. A hotel with a garden setting within the hotel. It is also within, a short walking distance from Malioboro Street, the famous shopping street in Yogyakarta. Just next door is also a small Mall and supermarket, to satisfy basic needs. I will definitely return to this hotel, for my next trip.
Very convenient location within short walking distance to Malioboro street which is the busiest shopping strip in Jogyakarta.
We had a very plesant stay at the hotel. The hotel has had major renovation project, and room is much better than before. I will recommend this hotel to everyone who go to Yogyakarta.

I guess you get what you pay for.  This hotel is reasonably priced. It has recently undergone renovation. But only in the lobby. The room was kind of shabby. The flooring looked as though it had been there a decade. The bedding wasn’t great. And there was a door between our room and the next was so thin it was like the people in the next room were in our room. But reasonable value for money I guess.

Staff service, restaurant food quality are excellent 

But hairdryer in room is too weak and room looks abit old

WE very much enjoyed the Melia Purosani, which is just a short walk from the Marlioboro area of Yogyakarta. It is an easy walk to the Sultan's Palace, and if you turn right as you leave, it is almost next door to the Beringharjo traditional markets.
Our room was lovely and clean, and we received exceptional service from all of the staff, particularly Agus in the lounge who gave us some very good sightseeing tips.
Overall an excellent stay in a wonderful hotel.

The rooms are nicely upgraded, clean, comfortable and spacious. The hotel environment is comfortable be it in the lobby or the pool area. The staff are helpful and accommodating. The buffet breakfast has variety but the quality can be improved. The egg station is good. Generally it has been a pleasant stay.  Location is good, central and a stone throw away from Marlioboro for the street shopping. It’s a 15 mins walk but one can always choose a motorised rickshaw.
Hotel is nice and spacious, right behind the shopping street of Malioboro which makes it very convenient. Staff are very attentive and friendly.

Beautiful and feels luxurious with nice pool and outdoor dining area. Has a Chinese restaurant whose food is not bad and I really like the decor. Staff are friendly and attentive. Interesting cultural music band at the hall. Room is large, though the bed is too firm for my liking. TV quite small too. Wi-Fi is good, allows connection of at least 2 devices.
Nice hotel with beautiful garden in the center of town
good central location, large room, nice bathroom, the  breakfast was amazing
Great staff and wonderful location ....very nice facilities a haven within the city

The Melia Purosani Yogyakarta is a very nice hotel to be in. All the staff that I had a conservation with are super nice and friendly. I even got a surprise complimentary cake on my birthday. Of all my years traveling on my birthday, this is the first hotel that wishes Happy Birthday to me at the lobby when i was asking for locations around the hotel.

The Hotel is conveniently located near Malioboro street and Pasar Beringharjo.

It’s wasn’t my  expectation . It’s very slow service for 5 stars hotel. I had been to a different Grand Meliá or  Meliá this the worse experience I have.  The towels is old towels, the bathroom it was smell bad. I called the front desk few times to brings me more towels and bathroom stuffs. No once bringing it to my room till the next day when the the cleaning lady ready to cleaning my room....for me this hotel almost like 3 starts hotel. I am very disappointed with all overall
Nice hotel with good service. Will recomend to family and friends 😘

1st class Hotel, 5 star luxury accomodations, outstanding pool with slide in wonderful garden setting, with outstanding service in all aspects.of facilities, restauraunts, exercise rooms, penthouse tea room on 6 floor. Thoroughly maintained, you won't want to leave.

Nice Hotel, Nice breakfast. Issues with this Hotels Payment System. They use BCA Card payment but cant take Debit Cards and will ask you to pay in Cash Instead. I dont hold Credit Cards so for me this was a hassle to get out of the way. I dont see why they cant take Debit cards but it seems to be a hotel policy. Apart from that the hotel is nice, breakfast is excellent and overall highly recommended. Wifi was a hassle to deal with.
convinience location and comfortable restaurant for breakfast
Location is good
I Recomended to all of you to enjoy and happiness holiday in yogyakarta and stay at this hotel

I stayed two nights here and found the hotel staff very helpful and friendly. The hotel is about a 5 min stroll to Jalan Malioboro and it’s great for those who enjoy shopping for batik and snacks along this lovely street.

I enjoyed my lunch at the Cing San Restauarnt (Chinese food) and the room service was also good. There seems to be a strange smell in the bathroom of my room but overall the room was very clean and comfortable.
This is a terrific hotel.  It has a great gym and pool, and the staff is great.  It's pretty close to the main areas of Yogyakarta and you can walk anywhere within the main parts of the city.
Our stay at Melia Purosani was wonderful-very clean room, professional and helpful staff, good Chinese restaurant, nice spa, close to Malioboro shopping area.

Close to action in downtown. Wasn't as impressed with the breakfast as others--ok not great. Pool grounds were nice and cool. Room was noisy--thanks to massive exhaust fans and aircon condensers. The worst... ants in my bed each night!! Too much trouble to call front desk, just killed the little varmits and swept them off bed. Told management at checkout--didnt seem very concerned.

Overall a nice and clean hotel.
However we have some issues with the wifi connection. Otherwise breakfast was good and the small little snacks that they leave in the room was really thoughtful.
There’s a supermarket just next to the hotel where you can get your daily necessities there.

We loved the hotel except for the lack of noise barrier from the glass windows and doors. We were awakened at 4 am and bothered on at least one other occasion with the call to prayer from the mosque nearby. The noise of the traffic was also annoying whenever we were in the room. Triple pane glass would make a big difference to the comfort level of the room we were in, 531.
Excellent property with all the amenities.  Great breakfast and dinners
Had an amazing during my stay.. will be back again for sure!
Strategic place to tour the area by foot

Overall the experience was quite positive.
The breakfast is varied and of great quality. The hotel grounds are very attractive. The staff is helpful and attentive. The rent-a-car service and tour service is very professional and reliable, although not cheap. The location is superb, walking distance from Jalan Malioboro, Malioboro Mall, Fort Vredeburg and a short Grab ride to the Kraton and to the Taman Sari.

Only big minus was the WiFi, which was quite sloppy... we spent 3 of the 2 days in the hotel with no WiFi connection. Seriously?
歴史のあるホテルで、部屋の作り、内装、建物自体、敷地に重厚な重みを感じる。プールも良い。朝食は他が良いだけに残念ながら、美味しくない。

Grande chambre propre, confortable. Mais ce que j'ai remarqué même dans les hôtels 5 étoiles les tasses mises à notre disposition ne sont pas bien nettoyées chaque jour. Grand buffet pour le petit déjeuner. Le personnel était souriant, serviable.
말리오
너무좋은시간을 가질수 있는 호텔.

hôtel à proximité du centre ville de Yogyakarta : Malioboro street, Keraton, Water Palace.
Très appréciable
아주 만족스럽습니다 친절하고 음식도 아주 맛있습니다 말리오보로도 가깝습니다
スタッフのホスピタリティーは素晴らしいし、料理の味も良かった。部屋のせいそうも満足いくものであり、壁面の汚れも無く、到着時には満足であった。流石に、設備や調度品の古さはいたしかた無いのか、シャワーの湯が出なかったり、シャワーブースの扉が閉まりきらなかったり、引き出しの取手が外れて使えなかったりした。クラブラウンジは、所謂5星ホテルのサービス内容では無かった。
직원들은 친철했으며 바로옆에 마켓이  있어  편리했고 다만 수영장에 비치 파라솔이 부족하여  불편함

朝食も美味しく、隣にローカルのスーパーもあり、お土産探しに便利です。
マリオボロ通りまでは歩いて10分ほどでした。
日本語が話せるスタッフさんに、とてもお世話になりました。
ありがとうございます。
ホテルスタッフは皆明るくフレンドリーで、こちらのつたない英語も一生懸命聞きとっていただき、助かりました！
ロケーションは最高にいいです。両替ができなかったのは意外でした。

Très bel hôtel avec une belle piscine sans oublier son spa que je recommande. Les restaurant sont corrects, bien que pour un 5 étoiles, on attend un peu mieux. Sinon le bar longe, et tous les services sont parfaits. De plus l'hôtel est à 5 mn à pied de Malioboro street ce qui est très agréable. Si j devais retourner à Yogyakarta, sans hésitation je réserverai à nouveau cet hôtel.
中華料理のレストランはスタッフ、味、価格とも良心的で最高でした。
朝食の種類が豊富で、また6時からレストランがやっているのはうれしい。

멜리아 푸로사니 호텔은 말리오보로 몰에서 걸어서 15분 정도 걸리는 곳에 위치 합니다.
(후문으로 들어가면 더 가까워요. 그리고 구글지도에서 지름길도 안내하는데 밤 8시 이후에는 문이 닫히니까 큰길로 다니는게 좋습니다.)
호텔 조식도 간단해 보이지만 종류별로 갖춰져 있고, 호텔 내의 식당 음식도 아주 맛있었습니다.
there is not any handtowels in the room.
シャワーの出が、少し弱いのが気になったが、他は、非常に良かったです。

Quartos deixam muito a desejar.
Spa fraco.
Café da manhã excelente!!
Área do hotel muito barulho.

料金以上のホテルだと思います。
部屋も綺麗で使いやすく、マリオボロ通りへ行くにも近くて便利です。
スタッフはみなさん笑顔でとても優しく、癒されました。
Good location. Hardware is good but breakfast experience is not so good. No lead to the seat so you have to find the seat by your own while it is busy and not easy to get one.
Es un Hotel encantador muy bien ubicado y el personal muy agradable.
24時間営業のカフェが良かったです。
Prachtig hotel. Mooi zwembad. Aardig personeel. Schoon.
スタッフはフレンドリーでエアコンも効いてて快適でした。朝ごはんのブッフェも種類がたくさんで最高です。周りの喧騒を忘れゆっくりと過ごせました。部屋のシャワー、バスタブが水が外に出るので少し使いづらかったくらい。
위치가 여행하기는 좋고, 직원들은 아주 친절합니다
スタッフやラウンジのコンシェルジュのサービスやおもてなしは素晴らしいと思います。プールやレストラン等どの設備を利用しても気持ち良かったです。夜プールサイドでのコンサート？の爆音で睡眠が妨害されました。またシャワーの水圧が弱くストレスでした。

Water area in the gym is not well maintained and not super clean. Rooms facing the street are noisy. They asked me for 20 usd in cash as deposit during check in, i forgot to ask it back when I left and they did not remind me. After one week I still have no news in spite of the fact that I called them... not very correct
施設が多少古くなっている。
ステキなホテルでした！

繁華街に近い。
メインレストランはやや高いが、ボリュームはある。
Súper bien el hotel limpio y con gran atención, me encantaría volver
Fint hotell. Glimrende utgangspunkt for severdigheter i området, for eks, Borubudor,

スタッフの方々の接客も設備も文句なし。ボロブドゥールへのツアーも手配してもらいました。現地での知名度が高いようで、輪タクでホテルの名を言えばすぐに連れて行ってくれます。
朝食バイキングはインドネシア各地の料理や日本食コーナーもあったりしてバラエティ豊かですが、混雑する前に行ったほうがよさそうです。

Très bien placé, personnel gentil, restaurants bien, surtout le restaurant chinois, excellent. La chambre était bien et grande. Je recommande, tout près de la rue Malioboro et du marché et on peut aller à pied au Palais du Sultan.
Funcionários gentis, localização razoável, café da manhã fraco para ocidentais. Comida muito típica da Ásia em geral. Quarto grande, boa cama e roupa de cama de boa qualidade.
Hotellet var ikke så bra som sist vi var der. Hygienen var vi ikke fornøyd med. Men personalet er hyggelig
Heel mooi hotel met een geweldig zwembad en super aardig personeel
Jättefin hotel i en trevlig stad.
市街地に近い割には周辺は静かなので、ゆっくり休めます

マリオボロ通りまで徒歩圏内という立地の良さで選んだが、正解だった。
地元では有名なホテルのようで、グラブなどで車を呼ぶにも便利。
客室は日本のシティホテルとほぼ同等だが、5つ星だけあって従業員のサービスが洗練されている。
エアメールの投函代行をお願いしたが、すぐに対応してくれるなど好印象だった。
朝食はインドネシア料理や洋食、和食まで幅広くそろっており飽きなかった。
部屋のファシリティが古く、シャワーの温度調整がうまくできなかった。中庭で遅くまでイベントをしていて、歌が大音量でうるさくて仕方なかった。
古いホテルなので、水周りの設備を中心に、老朽化が進んでいる。レソトランの外は喫煙可なのだが、喫煙者が多すぎて、食事に影響が出でいるように思う。分煙が望まれる。プールサイドのリクライニングチェアーを増やした方がいい。

Fue una estancia increíble. Estuvimos tres noches y todos los servicios fueron impeclables. 

La habitación era perfecta y muy limpia. Cada día nos dejaban dulces y el primer día, al saber que estábamos de luna de miel, nos trajeron un plato con pastel y detalles y la cama estaba decorada. 

La piscina estaba genial y casi siempre vacía y tranquila. El desayuno increíble y variado y el restaurante del hotel (El Patio) muy bien de precio. 

Tuvimos que hacer alguna excursión y nos la organizaron en la misma agencia del hotel, fuera hubiera sido más barata pero como íbamos mal de tiempo nos fue muy útil y la excursión estuvo muy bien.

Por la relación calidad precio repetiríamos mil veces y nos hubiera encantado estar más. Sin duda, fue de lo mejor de nuestro paso por Yogyakarta.

Hotel bonito, cómodo, limpio, totalmente acertado , una buena piscina y personal cualificado y muy amable. Llegas caminando en 3 minutos a malioboro street por lo que está cerca de restaurantes, tiendas y masajes
Hotel muy bonito, servicio perfecto, estancia muy agradable, todo limpio y habitaciones muy cómodas. Muy cerca de malioboro street para ir caminando.
このホテルに6泊しましたが、部屋の広さや調度品は満足できるものでした。WiFiとTVチャンネル数も十分。シーツ取り換え不要のシステムがあり、シーツ交換は中日の1日だけにしました。冷蔵庫のドアと浴槽横の棚の隅が汚れていたのが少々気になりました。2つあるレストランはどちらも美味しく快適でした。フロントに日本語を話せる女性の方が1名いました。ホテル横にホテル名入りのベチャがたくさん常駐していました。
ゆったりできて素晴らしいホテルでした！
繁華街へのアクセスは便利、しかし目の前にモスクがあり朝4時半からお祈りの音で起こされる以外は良かったです。
マリオボロ通りから近く、非常に便利です。部屋は中庭に面していたので静かでした。マリオボロモールも近くにあり、地下のスーパーでビールを買う事が出来ました。
Muy bien situado y ademas tiene todo lujo de detalles. Sin duda me quedaria en el

Points positifs : très bel hôtel avec jardin paysage et belle piscine , magnifique décoration des parties communes et des chambres 
Personnel très aimable et souriant
A 500 m du centre Marlboro 
Points négatifs 
Sur 2 nuits nous avons dormi 1 nuit côté rue et 1 côté piscine : il est impossible de dormir côté rue avec les bruits des motos toute la nuit . D’ailleurs on nous a proposé des boules kies à l’accueil en rigolant .
Dans la chambre côté piscine , et dans le couloir il était autorisé de fumer et il’y Avait une forte odeur de tabac 
Le niveau de la restauration est très moyenne , nous avons dîner lors d.une soirée BBQ et les viandes et poissons n’avaient pas beaucoup de goût 
Pour le PDJ pas terrible non plus sauf la’ partie œuf et gaufre 
Wifi lent

Escogimos este hotel por ser aparentemente una opción segura. EL hotel muy bien en general, pero pillamos una intoxicación alimentaria. No comimos fuera del hotel durante nuestra estancia y el dia en el que me nos fuimos estuve vomitando y con diarrea, arruinándonos parte de nuestras vacaciones además de lo horrible de la situación.

２４時間営業のレストラン。
朝食は和食コーナーがある。どれも美味しい。
ガーデンも雰囲気が良くのんびり滞在ができる。
Nice staff, nice view, nice garden with pool, good wifi, good bed and pillows. Central location, next to Malioboro street.
good

マリオボロ通りに至近で便利です。

事前のメールでのやり取りも迅速で的確、到着後・滞在中のベル・レセプション・コンシェルジュ・レストラン・スパ等お会いしたスタッフの応対は全て温かみがありました。伝達事項も確り引き継がれており（アジアの大らかさでヤキモキすることなく）安心感があります。

施設は古いですが、部屋は広くトイレは簡易ながらウォシュレットがありました。

食事は朝食のみ頂きましたが品数も豊富で美味しく、屋外でも楽しめます。

スパも（全てのコースが対応可かはわかりませんが、）インルームで対応してくれます。レベルも相応で宿泊の２日間ともお願いしました。

訪問機会があれば再度当ホテルに宿泊したいと思います。
very good swiming pool and sauna

Very nice hotel, super location
The staff is very very friendly.
We had a room with a view to the pool and garden, more quiet as well.
There is a mosque nearby.
But the sound of the mosque will be a part of being there.
Excellent breakfast, special if you are from asia.
But plenty enough for the more western taste.

Het hotel was in een woord geweldig maar de stad Jogjakarta was voor ons iets te chaotisch en viezig! Wel wat excursies gedaan naar de mooie tempels, goed geregeld door Hotel! Rest van de tijd het meest in hotel en zwembad verbleven en gegeten. Mooi gebaar van hotel was ook om met onze vroege ochtendvlucht naar Bali een ontbijtbox mee te geven (hadden wij zelf niet eens over na gedacht).
Jätte bra hotel med super snälla och trevliga människor! Det finns en ganska stor gallerian bakom hotellet där man kan köpa läsk och frukt. Mycket bekvämt och fint.
The hotel is a bit noisy

This hotel has a clean room, nice staff and relaxing pool.
And not so far from Malioboro street. Convenient.
I enjoyed some Jawa food for my breakfast.
Excelente, buena ubicacion

Court sejour, une nuit, et pour visiter les monuments locaux le lendemain.
Le personnel a ete tres attentifs.
Bardzo dobry hotel położony w centrum miasta, ale w środku cisza. Pokoje ładne i czyste. Śniadania są ok i duży wybór.

・チェックイン17:00位だったのですが、受付に一人しかいなくて、その場で順番待ち１５分程度待たされた。
・３泊したのですが、洗面所に用意されているタオル類が、古いのと、ゴワゴワにて身体を拭く時痛い。
（古い事はもちろんですが、柔軟剤等使用すれば、もう少し柔らかくなるのでは）
５日間滞在しました。1番良かったのは中心地にありながらリゾート気分を味わえるリラックス型ホテルだということです。また観光は歩いてマリオボロやクラトンまで行けます。名物のベチャに乗ってもさほど高くない距離ですから思う存分楽しめます。ホテルの中庭はまるでリゾート！プールサイドで寛ぎ、スパでリラックス、お食事もできます。スタッフの方々も笑顔。英語も通じます。リピート決定のホテルです。

Hôtel confortable, situé assez près des sites à visiter.
Personnel accueillant 
Excellent breakfast 
Agence de voyage dans l’hôtel
黒とベージュを基調にしたシックでモダンな雰囲気。ただ照明が暗いので明るい部屋が好きな方には微妙。となりに地元のスーパーがあるので、ちょっとした買い物には困りません。
조식포함이고 시내에 위치해있어서 편리함이 있어요

Hotel lindo a poucos metros da rua principal Malioboro Road, excelente conforto, preço, pequeno almoço e área circundante!!!
O único ponto negativo é a falta de isolamento dos quartos virados para a rua, o trânsito é infernal toda a noite, é pior que isso é a mesquita ali próxima que todas as manhãs as 04:00 acordam toda a cidade e não voltamos a dormir antes das5, porque os cânticos são ineterruptos...,
Excelente el Hotel y sus aéreas verdes
房間很好

3 Tage Aufenthalt in diesem schönen Hotel...
Kann ich nur empfehlen

Location: a short stroll to the main Malioboro avenue and at walking distance to the main train station (though with lugage you better take a taxi).
Hotel premises: big and resort-style, but you never feel like you are in a huge place; very new and efficient, with a beautiful courtyard featuring a fantastic swimming pool. The hotel hosts a travel agent and driver's services, which can be practical for arranging tours.
Staff: efficient and helpful
Restaurant: tried it several times for dinner, really worthwhile with good choice of different styles of dishes. While waiting time was at times a bit longish, the result was worth the wait.
Breakfast: very good choice of products, very fresh, catering to all tastes (Western and Asian)
Room: spacious, clean and nicely designed, with a sizeable bathroom; everything in good working order; excellent noise insulation provides for a good night sleep; WiFi was reliable and fast in both the room and common places (including courtyard).
Overall: top-notch hotel, most likely the best in town.
Bom hotel no centro de Yogyakarta. Staff atencioso e suite confortável.
익스피디아vip라 룸업그레이드와 얼리체크인 식음료,스파 할인혜택 아주 잘 받았어요. 물론 호텔에서 방이 여유 있었으니 그렇게 해 줬을거라 생각합니다.친절한 스텝들과 말리오보로거리와의 적당한위치 따만사리까지 걸어서는 조금 멀지만 베짝타고 20루피아o25만루피아에 갈수있어요.다음에 온다면 또 스테이할 예정입니다.

とても利便性の良いホテルでした。ベチャの待合所があり、マリオボロ通りまで移動できる。
室内は洗練されたスタイリッシュな感じでした。

マリオボロ通りからも近く、買い物に行くのが便利です。
日本語を話せるホテルのスタッフが良いレートの両替所や美味しいレストランを教えてくれました。
初めてのインドネシアだったので、本当に助かりました。
着いてすぐにお部屋までウェルカムスイーツを持ってきてくれたことも嬉しかったです。
朝食も美味しかったのでまたジョグジャカルタに行ったら泊まりたいです。

I stayed this hotel when I went to Yogyakarta. It was very comfortable to stay here because of clean and wide space. I felt that the hotel staffs were also very kindness and they want me to accept my requests with their smile. So, I strongly recommend that visiter of Yogyakarta should stay here once time. To do so, many people love to stay here.
飯店環境很好、早餐豐盛好吃，服務人員態度佳，唯伊斯蘭教做早課音量太大，影響住宿品質
とっても居心地のよいホテルです。ジョグジャカルタには、今ホテルがたくさんできているようですが、マリオボロ通りにも近く快適でした。朝食なしのプランを選択してしまい、エクスペディアに朝食付きにしてほしいと電話したのですが、すげなくキャンセル不可で、ホテルで、一人10ドル払って食べれます。と断られました。杓子定規な対応でした。
옷 일부를 빠뜨렸다가 Lost and Found에서 보관을 잘해 주셔서 바로 찾을 수 있었음. 바로 옆에 몰도 있고, 위치도 나쁘지 않음. 족자 방문시 추천할 만함.
